name: Silurian
description: 443.8 - 419.2 mya$(br2)$(l)Jawless Fish World$() $(br)Due to the extinction event at the end of the Ordovician Period, the jawless fish began to dominate, along with the Eurypterids, while the Nautiloids and Trilobites began to decline.$(br2)$(l)Portal Block: Prototaxites Block
